Ejemplo 1Example 1

Procedimiento de aislamiento de clulas hepticasLiver cell isolation procedure

Se obtuvieron clulas hepticas humanas a partir de hgado completo o segmentos de hgado originarios de donantes sanos fallecidos o sin latido cardiaco. Se aislaron las clulas despus de un tiempo de pinzamiento (por ejemplo, despus de entre 6 y 12 horas de tiempo de pinzamiento) mientras los hgados se mantenan en hielo en medio de la Universidad de Wisconsin hasta la perfusin. Se aislaron los hepatocitos usando una tcnica de perfusin en dos etapas clsica {Seglen, 1976}, {Stephenne, 2005}. Se perfundi secuencialmente tejido heptico por los vasos sanguneos aparentes con una disolucin de EGTA (disolucin salina equilibrada de Earl sin Ca++ y Mg++, EGTA 0,5 mM, Hepes 5 mM, gentamicina 2 mg/l y 100.000 UI/l de penicilina G) y una disolucin de enzima de digestin durante 9 a 12 horas, cada una a 37C. La disolucin de digestin (EBSS con Ca++ y Mg++, Hepes 5 mM, gentamicina 2 mg/l y 100.000 UI/l de penicilina G) inclua colagenasa P 0,9 mg/ml e inhibidor de tripsina de soja 0,03 mg/ml. Se realiz una incisin de la cpsula heptica y se liberaron los hepatocitos mediante agitacin suave. Se detuvo la digestin con medio de lavado enfriado con hielo (medio M199, Hepes 5 mM, gentamicina 2 mg/l y 100.000 UI/l de penicilina G) que contena inhibidor de tripsina de soja 0,03 mg/ml y plasma humano 100 ml/l. Se filtraron las clulas y se aclararon a travs de 4 tamices metlicos de respectivamente 4,5 mm, 1 mm, 0,5 mm y 0,25 mm de tamao de poro. Se lavaron las clulas 3 veces mediante centrifugacin a 1200 rpm durante 3 minutos en un medio de lavado M199 fro.Human liver cells were obtained from whole liver or liver segments originating from deceased healthy donors or without heartbeat. The cells were isolated after a clamping time (for example, after 6 to 12 hours of clamping time) while the livers were kept on ice in the middle of the University of Wisconsin until perfusion. Hepatocytes were isolated using a classical two-stage perfusion technique {Seglen, 1976}, {Stephenne, 2005}. Hepatic tissue was sequentially perfused by the apparent blood vessels with a solution of EGTA (Earl balanced saline solution without Ca ++ and Mg ++, 0.5 mM EGTA, 5 mM Hepes, 2 mg / L gentamicin and 100,000 IU / L of penicillin G) and a digestion enzyme solution for 9 to 12 hours, each at 37 C. The digestion solution (EBSS with Ca ++ and Mg ++, 5 mM Hepes, 2 mg / l gentamicin and 100,000 IU / l penicillin G) included collagenase P 0.9 mg / ml and soy trypsin inhibitor 0.03 mg / ml. An incision of the hepatic capsule was made and hepatocytes were released by gentle agitation. Digestion was stopped with ice-cold washing medium (M199 medium, 5 mM Hepes, 2 mg / l gentamicin and 100,000 IU / l penicillin G) containing 0.03 mg / ml soy trypsin inhibitor and 100 ml human plasma / l. The cells were filtered and rinsed through 4 metal sieves respectively 4.5 mm, 1 mm, 0.5 mm and 0.25 mm pore size. The cells were washed 3 times by centrifugation at 1200 rpm for 3 minutes in a cold M199 wash medium.

Cultivo de clulas primariasPrimary cell culture

Se resuspendieron suspensiones de clulas nicas en medio E de Williams (Invitrogen) complementado con suero de ternera fetal (FCS) al 10% (Perbio, Hyclone), EGF 25 ng/ml (Peprotech), insulina 10 |ig/ml, dexametasona 1 |iM y 1% de penicilina/estreptomicina (P/S) (Invitrogen). Se sembraron las clulas en matraces o placas recubiertos con colgeno I de cola de rata (BD Biosciences) (por ejemplo placas de 6 pocillos) (Greiner Bio-one) y se cultivaron a 37C en una atmsfera totalmente humidificada que contena 5% de CO2. Despus de 24 horas, se cambi el medio para eliminar las clulas no adherentes y despus de ello se renov cada tres das. Durante dos semanas, se sigui el cultivo microscpicamente cada da y se analiz el medio de cultivo cada tres das. Se cambi entonces el medio de cultivo a DMEM con concentraciones altas de glucosa (Invitrogen) complementado con 10% de FCS (Perbio, Hyclone) y 1% de P/S (Invitrogen) para acelerar la eliminacin de hepatocitos adultos. Emergi entonces espontneamente un tipo de clula con morfologa de tipo mesenquimtica, prolifer y rellen el espacio vaco en la placa de pocillos, como se confirma mediante microscopa de contraste de fases. Estas clulas aparecieron entre el da 15 y 20 del cultivo y presentaban una forma aplanada, citoplasma amplio y ncleos ovoides con uno o dos nucleolos (figura 1). Al alcanzar un 70% de confluencia, se sacaron las clulas con 0,25% de tripsina y EDTA 1 mM y se resembraron a la concentracin deseada. El anlisis de la suspensin celular usando citometra de flujo mostr que la poblacin se volva homognea despus del pase 2. Para cada pase, se analiz la suspensin celular tambin usando PCT-TI e inmunofluorescencia.Single cell suspensions were resuspended in Williams E medium (Invitrogen) supplemented with 10% fetal calf serum (FCS) (Perbio, Hyclone), 25 ng / ml EGF (Peprotech), 10 | ig / ml insulin, dexamethasone 1 | iM and 1% penicillin / streptomycin (P / S) (Invitrogen). The cells were seeded in flasks or plates coated with rat tail collagen I (BD Biosciences) (eg 6-well plates) (Greiner Bio-one) and grown at 37 C in a fully humidified atmosphere containing 5% of CO2. After 24 hours, the medium was changed to remove non-adherent cells and after that it was renewed every three days. For two weeks, the culture was followed microscopically every day and the culture medium was analyzed every three days. The culture medium was then changed to DMEM with high glucose concentrations (Invitrogen) supplemented with 10% FCS (Perbio, Hyclone) and 1% P / S (Invitrogen) to accelerate the elimination of adult hepatocytes. A type of cell with mesenchymal type morphology then spontaneously emerged, proliferating and filling the empty space in the well plate, as confirmed by phase contrast microscopy. These cells appeared between day 15 and 20 of the culture and presented a flattened shape, wide cytoplasm and ovoid nuclei with one or two nucleoli (Figure 1). Upon reaching 70% confluence, the cells were removed with 0.25% trypsin and 1 mM EDTA and reseeded at the desired concentration. Analysis of the cell suspension using flow cytometry showed that the population became homogeneous after pass 2. For each pass, the cell suspension was also analyzed using PCT-TI and immunofluorescence.

Caracterizacin de las clulasCharacterization of the cells

Para evitar la posible contaminacin por otros tipos de clula, se efectu la inmunohistoqumica para estudiar el fenotipo de estas clulas. Debido a su origen heptico, se ha analizado la expresin de marcadores especficos tales como albmina en clulas fijadas con paraformaldehdo. Como se muestra en la figura 2, se detect albmina, que se expresa exclusivamente en hepatocitos, usando tanto anticuerpos monoclonales (clon HAS-111 de Sigma) como policlonales (Chemicon). En paralelo, se ha evaluado tambin la expresin de marcadores de clulas mesenquimales, demostrando que estas clulas son inmunopositivas de vimentina y a-actina de msculo liso (figura 2). Hasta ahora, las caractersticas fenotpicas se han estudiado durante 7 pases con gran estabilidad.To avoid possible contamination by other cell types, immunohistochemistry was performed to study the phenotype of these cells. Due to its hepatic origin, the expression of specific markers such as albumin in cells fixed with paraformaldehyde has been analyzed. As shown in Figure 2, albumin was detected, which is expressed exclusively in hepatocytes, using both monoclonal antibodies (Sigma HAS-111 clone) and polyclonal (Chemicon). In parallel, the expression of mesenchymal cell markers has also been evaluated, demonstrating that these cells are immunopositive of vimentin and smooth muscle a-actin (Figure 2). So far, phenotypic characteristics have been studied for 7 passes with great stability.

Diferenciacin celularCell differentiation

Se sembraron clulas a una densidad de 0,5 - 1x104/cm2 en placas de 6 pocillos recubiertas con colgeno de tipo I de cola de rata en DMEM complementado con FCS y P/S. Se cambi el medio de cultivo 24 horas despus por medio Dulbecco modificado por Iscove (IMDM) (Invitrogen). Para la induccin, se incubaron las clulas durante 2 semanas con medio de induccin que contena IMDM complementado con HGF 20 ng/ml (Biosource), bFGF 10 ng/ml (Peprotech) y nicotinamida 0,61 g/l (Sigma). Despus de ello, se incubaron las clulas con medio de maduracin que contena IMDM complementado con oncostatina M 20 ng/ml M (Sigma), dexametasona 1 |iM (Sigma) e ITS (insulina, transferrina, selenio) 50 mg/ml (Invitrogen). Para las etapas de induccin y maduracin, se cambi el medio y se analiz cada 3 das. Despus de la exposicin a estos ccteles, las clulas empezaron a perder sus bordes marcados, se encogieron progresivamente y perdieron su morfologa inicial adoptando una forma poligonal (figura 3).Cells were seeded at a density of 0.5-1x104 / cm 2 in 6-well plates coated with rat tail type I collagen in DMEM supplemented with FCS and P / S. The culture medium was changed 24 hours later by Dulbecco medium modified by Iscove (IMDM) (Invitrogen). For induction, the cells were incubated for 2 weeks with induction medium containing IMDM supplemented with 20 ng / ml HGF (Biosource), 10 ng / ml bFGF (Peprotech) and 0.61 g / l nicotinamide (Sigma). After that, the cells were incubated with maturation medium containing IMDM supplemented with oncostatin M 20 ng / ml M (Sigma), 1 | iM dexamethasone (Sigma) and STI (insulin, transferrin, selenium) 50 mg / ml (Invitrogen ). For the induction and maturation stages, the medium was changed and analyzed every 3 days. After exposure to these cocktails, the cells began to lose their marked edges, progressively shrunk and lost their initial morphology by adopting a polygonal shape (Figure 3).

Citometra de flujoFlow cytometry

Se recogieron clulas despus de centrifugacin a 1200 rpm durante 5 min y se resuspendieron a una concentracin de 500 a 1000/|il en PBS. Se incubaron entonces las clulas durante 30 minutos a 4C con anticuerpos. Se usaron los isotipos de control correspondientes para la evaluacin de la unin no especfica de anticuerpos monoclonales.Cells were collected after centrifugation at 1200 rpm for 5 min and resuspended at a concentration of 500 to 1000 l in PBS. The cells were then incubated for 30 minutes at 4 C with antibodies. The corresponding control isotypes were used for the evaluation of non-specific binding of monoclonal antibodies.

45Four. Five

50fifty

Se lavaron entonces las clulas y se resuspendieron en Isoton (Beckham Coulter) para lectura con un citmetro de flujo Beckham Coulter.The cells were then washed and resuspended in Isoton (Beckham Coulter) for reading with a Beckham Coulter flow cytometer.

RT-PCRRT-PCR

Se extrajo el ARN total de clulas cultivadas en placas de 6 pocillos usando el reactivo de aislamiento TriPure (Roche) y se gener ADNc usando el kit de transcripcin inversa segn las instrucciones del fabricante. Se efectuaron las amplificaciones por PCR usando polimerasa elongasa en un volumen final de 25 |il y cebadores apropiados. Se sometieron despus de ello las muestras a electroforesis en gel de agarosa al 1% y se visualizaron los cidos nucleicos mediante tincin con bromuro de etidio.Total RNA was extracted from cells cultured in 6-well plates using TriPure isolation reagent (Roche) and cDNA was generated using the reverse transcription kit according to the manufacturer's instructions. PCR amplifications were performed using polymerase elongase in a final volume of 25 l and appropriate primers. The samples were then subjected to 1% agarose gel electrophoresis and nucleic acids were visualized by ethidium bromide staining.

InmunofluorescenciaImmunofluorescence

Para inmunotincin, se fijaron con paraformaldehdo al 4% (v/v) durante 15 min a temperatura ambiente las clulas cultivadas sobre cubreobjetos de vidrio redondos de 12 mm recubiertos con colgeno I de cola de rata, y despus de ello se permeabilizaron con Triton X100 al 1% (v/v) en TBS (Tris-HCl 50 mM, NaCl 150 mM, pH 7,4) durante 15 min Se evit la inmunotincin no especfica mediante una incubacin de 1 h en una disolucin de TBS que contena leche desecada desnatada al 3% a 37C. Se incubaron entonces sucesivamente las clulas en la misma disolucin durante 1 h a temperatura ambiente con anticuerpos primarios, se aclararon 5 veces con TBS, y durante 1 hora con anticuerpos secundarios (1/500). Se tieron los ncleos durante 30 min con el tinte nuclear DAPI (1/5.000). Despus de 3 aclarados, se montaron las preparaciones en medio Fluoprep (BioMerieux, Bruselas, Blgica) y se examinaron usando un microscopio invertido Olympus IX70 acoplado con una cmara CCD (T.I.L.L. Photonics, Martinsried, Alemania). Se obtuvo la luz de excitacin (552, 488 y 372 nm para Cy-3, FITC y DAPI, respectivamente) con una lmpara de xenn acoplada con un monocromador (T.I.L.L. Photonics, Martinsried, Alemania). Se adquirieron imgenes digitales usando filtros apropiados y se combinaron usando el software TILLvision.For immunostaining, cells cultured on round 12mm glass coverslips coated with rat tail collagen I were fixed with 4% paraformaldehyde for 15 min at room temperature, and then permeabilized with Triton X100 1% (v / v) in TBS (50 mM Tris-HCl, 150 mM NaCl, pH 7.4) for 15 min Nonspecific immunostaining was avoided by incubation for 1 h in a TBS solution containing dried milk 3% skim at 37 C. The cells were then successively incubated in the same solution for 1 h at room temperature with primary antibodies, rinsed 5 times with TBS, and for 1 hour with secondary antibodies (1/500). The nuclei were stained for 30 min with the DAPI nuclear dye (1 / 5,000). After 3 rinses, the preparations were mounted in Fluoprep medium (BioMerieux, Brussels, Belgium) and examined using an Olympus IX70 inverted microscope coupled with a CCD camera (T.I.L.L. Photonics, Martinsried, Germany). The excitation light (552, 488 and 372 nm for Cy-3, FITC and DAPI, respectively) was obtained with a xenon lamp coupled with a monochromator (T.I.L.L. Photonics, Martinsried, Germany). Digital images were acquired using appropriate filters and combined using the TILLvision software.

Molculas detectadas en las clulas progenitoras o clulas madre de la invencinMolecules detected in the progenitor cells or stem cells of the invention

Usando los enfoques anteriores, se ha establecido el siguiente perfil de expresin de una serie de marcadores celulares en un experimento para las clulas establecidas en este ejemplo (ADHLSC):Using the above approaches, the following expression profile of a series of cell markers has been established in an experiment for the cells established in this example (ADHLSC):

Positivos para CD90. La CD90, o Thy-1, es una protena de superficie celular que se considera que es indicativa del linaje mesenquimal.Positive for CD90. CD90, or Thy-1, is a cell surface protein that is considered to be indicative of the mesenchymal lineage.

Positivos para CD44. La CD44 es una molcula de adhesin celular y se usa para identificar al menos algunos tipos de clulas madre mesenquimales (CBM).Positive for CD44. CD44 is a cell adhesion molecule and is used to identify at least some types of mesenchymal stem cells (CBM).

Positivos para vimentina. La vimentina es un filamento intermedio de tipo III detectado comnmente en clulas mesenquimales y fibroblastos.Positive for vimentin. Vimentin is an intermediate type III filament commonly detected in mesenchymal cells and fibroblasts.

Positivos para albmina. La albmina es una protena plasmtica producida y secretada por el hgado. En los hepatocitos, la albmina se encuentra habitualmente como protena citoplasmtica.Positive for albumin. Albumin is a plasma protein produced and secreted by the liver. In hepatocytes, albumin is usually found as a cytoplasmic protein.

Positivos para CD29. La CD29, tambin conocida como integrina p-1, es una glucoprotena transmembrana, tambin presente en tejido heptico, que se cree que forma con la integrina a un complejo receptor funcional implicado en la interaccin con la matriz extracelular.Positive for CD29. CD29, also known as p-1 integrin, is a transmembrane glycoprotein, also present in liver tissue, which is believed to form a functional receptor complex with integrin involved in interaction with the extracellular matrix.

Positivos para CD73. La CD73 es una ecto-5'-nucleotidasa que se considera que es un marcador mesenquimal.Positive for CD73. CD73 is an ecto-5'-nucleotidase that is considered to be a mesenchymal marker.

Positivos para CD49b. La CD49b se denomina tambin integrina a-2 o receptor de colgeno y est implicada en la interaccin celular con la matriz extracelular.Positive for CD49b. CD49b is also called a-2 integrin or collagen receptor and is involved in cellular interaction with the extracellular matrix.

Positivos para HLA-ABC. Los HLA-ABC (antgenos de leucocitos humanos A, B y C) son antgenos de clase I de complejo principal de histocompatibilidad que forman heterodmeros de membrana.Positive for HLA-ABC. HLA-ABC (human leukocyte antigens A, B and C) are class I major histocompatibility complex antigens that form membrane heterodimers.

Alfa-fetoprotena: bajos niveles de expresin. La a-fetoprotena es una protena expresada durante el desarrollo del endodermo primitivo, y a lo largo de la maduracin refleja el linaje endodrmico. Altos niveles de expresin de a- fetoprotena revelan habitualmente una desviacin tumorignica.Alpha-fetoprotein: low levels of expression. A-fetoprotein is a protein expressed during the development of the primitive endoderm, and throughout maturation it reflects the endodermal lineage. High levels of expression of afetoprotein usually reveal a tumorigenic deviation.

Positivos para a-1-antitripsina. La a-1-antitripsina es una protena plasmtica sintetizada por el hgado.Positive for a-1-antitrypsin. A-1-antitrypsin is a plasma protein synthesized by the liver.

Positivos para glucosa 6-fosfatasa (G6P). La G6P es una enzima heptica que hidroliza glucosa 6-fosfato a glucosa y fosfato inorgnico, permitiendo a la glucosa del hgado entrar en la sangre.Positive for glucose 6-phosphatase (G6P). G6P is a liver enzyme that hydrolyzes glucose 6-phosphate to glucose and inorganic phosphate, allowing liver glucose to enter the blood.

Positivos para citocromo P450 1B1 (CYP1B1). El CYP1B1 es un citocromo inducible por dioxina responsable del metabolismo de fase I de un amplio intervalo de sustratos estructuralmente distintos.Positive for cytochrome P450 1B1 (CYP1B1). CYP1B1 is a dioxin-inducible cytochrome responsible for phase I metabolism of a wide range of structurally distinct substrates.

Positivos para citocromo P450 3A4 (CYP3A4). La CYP3A4 es una enzima crucial implicada en el metabolismo de xenobiticos.Positive for cytochrome P450 3A4 (CYP3A4). CYP3A4 is a crucial enzyme involved in xenobiotic metabolism.

55

1010

15fifteen

20twenty

3535

4040

45Four. Five

Positivos para factor nuclear de hepatocitos 4 (HNF-4). El HNF4, un receptor nuclear, es un factor de transcripcin implicado en la regulacin del metabolismo de la energa.Positive for nuclear hepatocyte factor 4 (HNF-4). HNF4, a nuclear receptor, is a transcription factor involved in the regulation of energy metabolism.

Positivas de triptfano 2,3-dioxigenasa (TDO). La TDO es la primera enzima implicada en la oxidacin de triptfano en el hgado.Positive tryptophan 2,3-dioxygenase (TDO). TDO is the first enzyme involved in the oxidation of tryptophan in the liver.

Positivos para tirosina aminotransferasa (TAT). La TAT es una enzima especfica de hgado mitocondrial implicada en el metabolismo de aminocidos y la gluconeognesis.Positive for tyrosine aminotransferase (TAT). TAT is a specific mitochondrial liver enzyme involved in amino acid metabolism and gluconeogenesis.

Positivos para glutamina sintasa (GS). La GS es una enzima clave para la asimilacin de amonio.Positive for glutamine synthase (GS). GS is a key enzyme for the assimilation of ammonium.

Positivos para gamma-glutamil transpeptidasa (GGT). La GGT es una enzima implicada en el metabolismo del glutatin.Positive for gamma-glutamyl transpeptidase (GGT). GGT is an enzyme involved in glutathione metabolism.

Positivos para citoqueratina 8 (CK8). La CK8 es un filamento intermedio especfico de clulas epiteliales.Positive for cytokeratin 8 (CK8). CK8 is a specific intermediate filament of epithelial cells.

Positivos para protena multirresistente a frmacos 2 (MRP2). La MRP2 es un transportador de aniones orgnicos responsable de la exportacin de aniones orgnicos intracelulares desde los hepatocitos al rbol biliar.Positive for multi-drug resistant protein 2 (MRP2). MRP2 is an organic anion transporter responsible for the export of intracellular organic anions from hepatocytes to the biliary tree.

Positivos para transportador de glutamato 2 (EAAT2). La presencia de muchas de las molculas anteriores que pueden particular en la funcin y el metabolismo heptico es indicativa del estrecho ligamiento de la lnea celular ADHLSC con fenotipos hepticos.Positive for glutamate transporter 2 (EAAT2). The presence of many of the above molecules that may be particular in liver function and metabolism is indicative of the close linkage of the ADHLSC cell line with liver phenotypes.

Negativos para CD117. La CD117, tambin denominada c-kit, es un receptor de superficie celular en tipos de clula de mdula sea que identifica HSC y MSC y por lo tanto caracteriza clulas madre bastante indiferenciados.Negative for CD117. CD117, also called c-kit, is a cell surface receptor in bone marrow cell types that identifies HSC and MSC and therefore characterizes fairly undifferentiated stem cells.

Negativos para CD34. La CD34 es una protena de superficie celular en clulas de mdula sea, indicativa de HSC y progenitor endotelial.Negative for CD34. CD34 is a cell surface protein in bone marrow cells, indicative of HSC and endothelial progenitor.

Negativos para CD45. La CD45, tambin denominada antgeno de leucocitos, es una tirosina fosfatasa expresada en clulas de linaje hematopoytico, incluyendo clulas madre hematopoyticas.Negative for CD45. CD45, also called leukocyte antigen, is a tyrosine phosphatase expressed in hematopoietic lineage cells, including hematopoietic stem cells.

Negativos para CD105. La CD105, tambin denominada SH2 o endoglina, es una molcula de adhesin. Se considera tambin que es un marcador de clulas madre mesenquimales.Negative for CD105. CD105, also called SH2 or endoglin, is an adhesion molecule. It is also considered to be a marker of mesenchymal stem cells.

Negativos para CD133. La CD133 es un marcador de clulas madre hematopoyticas.Negative for CD133. CD133 is a marker of hematopoietic stem cells.

Negativos para HLA-DR. Estos antgenos de clase II de complejo principal de histocompatibilidad son heterodmeros de membrana expresados restrictivamente en clulas presentadoras de antgeno.Negative for HLA-DR. These class II major histocompatibility complex antigens are membrane heterodimers expressed restrictively in antigen presenting cells.

Negativos para Oct-4. El Oct-4 es un factor de transcripcin expresado solo por clulas madre pluripotentes y esencial para el mantenimiento del estado indiferenciado.Negative for Oct-4. Oct-4 is a transcription factor expressed only by pluripotent stem cells and essential for the maintenance of the undifferentiated state.

Negativos para citoqueratina 19 (CK19). La CK19 se usa ampliamente como marcador de clulas biliares, concretamente colangiocitos.Negative for cytokeratin 19 (CK19). CK19 is widely used as a marker for bile cells, specifically cholangiocytes.

Negativos para citocromo P 2B6 (CYP2B6). El CYP2B6 est implicado en el metabolismo de endo- y xenobiticos. CD54: Molcula de adhesin intercelular 1 (ICAM-1), una glucoprotena de membrana.Negative for cytochrome P 2B6 (CYP2B6). CYP2B6 is involved in the metabolism of endo- and xenobiotics. CD54: Intercellular adhesion molecule 1 (ICAM-1), a membrane glycoprotein.

Sin pretender limitar en modo alguno, los presentes inventores, basndose en su conocimiento de los marcadores celulares, plantearon una posible interpretacin de los datos anteriores: Esta combinacin de marcadores define una lnea celular original que expresa marcadores del linaje mesenquimal (CD90, CD73, vimentina, CD44) as como marcadores caractersticos de la ruta de diferenciacin heptica (CD29 y albmina, a-1-antitripsina, HNF4, transportador MRP2). La presencia de albmina detectada tanto por inmunofluorescencia como por PCR-TI aboga fuertemente en contra de una posible contaminacin con clulas estrelladas. La ADHLSC no parece ser clulas madre mesenquimales indiferenciados pluripotentes (negativa de CD45, negativa de CD34, negativa de CD117, negativa de Oct-4), ni clulas estrelladas hepticas (positiva para albmina). La lnea ADHLSC parece asignada al linaje heptico (positiva para CD29, que expresa albmina y a-1-antitripsina), pero no expresa el marcador biliar tpico (negativa para CK19 y 7). Por tanto, las clulas y lneas celulares de la invencin pueden denotarse, en un modo no limitante, como una lnea de clulas madre mesenquimales con caractersticas de progenitor de hepatocito.Without intending to limit in any way, the present inventors, based on their knowledge of cell markers, raised a possible interpretation of the above data: This combination of markers defines an original cell line that expresses markers of the mesenchymal lineage (CD90, CD73, vimentin , CD44) as well as characteristic markers of the hepatic differentiation pathway (CD29 and albumin, a-1-antitrypsin, HNF4, MRP2 transporter). The presence of albumin detected both by immunofluorescence and by PCR-TI strongly advocates possible contamination with star cells. ADHLSC does not appear to be pluripotent undifferentiated mesenchymal stem cells (CD45 negative, CD34 negative, CD117 negative, Oct-4 negative), or hepatic starred cells (positive for albumin). The ADHLSC line appears to be assigned to the liver lineage (positive for CD29, which expresses albumin and a-1-antitrypsin), but does not express the typical biliary marker (negative for CK19 and 7). Therefore, the cells and cell lines of the invention can be denoted, in a non-limiting way, as a mesenchymal stem cell line with hepatocyte progenitor characteristics.

Trasplante, histologa e inmunohistoqumica de ratones uPA-SCIDTransplantation, histology and immunohistochemistry of uPA-SCID mice

Se inyectaron un milln de ADHLSC (>90% de viabilidad) en el bazo de ratones uPA+/+-SCID de 6-14 das de edad. Antes del trasplante, los ratones mostraron una albmina srica indetectable. La inmunohistoqumica en muestras de hgado de ratn se efectu en secciones de hgado de 4 |im de grosor que se tieron con hematoxilina y eosina (HE) para evaluacin histopatolgica global. Para la inmunotincin, se incubaron cortes de hgado durante una noche con anticuerpos primarios a temperatura ambiente. Se efectu la deteccin despus de incubar los cortes conOne million ADHLSC (> 90% viability) was injected into the spleen of uPA + / + - SCID mice aged 6-14 days. Before transplantation, the mice showed an undetectable serum albumin. Immunohistochemistry in mouse liver samples was performed in 4 | im thick liver sections that were stained with hematoxylin and eosin (HE) for global histopathological evaluation. For immunostaining, liver cuts were incubated overnight with primary antibodies at room temperature. Detection was performed after incubating the cuts with

55

1010

15fifteen

20twenty

2525

3030

3535

4040

polmero marcado con peroxidasa y sustrato cromognico (Envision-DAB System, Dako, Carpintera, CA). Se efectu la contratincin usando hematoxilina.polymer labeled with peroxidase and chromogenic substrate (Envision-DAB System, Dako, Carpintera, CA). Contratinction was performed using hematoxylin.

El modelo de ratn transgnico utilizado con este fin combina una patologa heptica (uPA) con inmunodeficiencia (SCID). Despus del trasplante intraesplnico de la suspensin de ADHLSC, se dejaron recuperaron los ratones uPA+/+-SCID durante 10 semanas. El anlisis de los hgados de los ratones uPA/SCID trasplantados con ADHLSC demostr que estas clulas eran capaces de injertarse (figura 4) y de diferenciarse en hepatocitos maduros (figura 5). Adems, se detect albmina humana en el suero de estos ratones trasplantados 10 semanas despus del trasplante, mientras que el nivel de a-fetoprotena expresada, un marcador del desarrollo tumoral, permaneca indetectable.The transgenic mouse model used for this purpose combines a liver pathology (uPA) with immunodeficiency (SCID). After intrasplenic transplantation of the ADHLSC suspension, the uPA + / + - SCID mice were allowed to recover for 10 weeks. Analysis of the livers of uPA / SCID mice transplanted with ADHLSC showed that these cells were able to graft (figure 4) and differentiate into mature hepatocytes (figure 5). In addition, human albumin was detected in the serum of these transplanted mice 10 weeks after transplantation, while the level of expressed a-fetoprotein, a marker of tumor development, remained undetectable.

Las clulas trasplantadas no sobreproliferaron como se muestra por observacin microscpica, indicando la ausencia de colonias tumorignicas y un nivel normal de expresin de los marcadores tumorignicos a-fetoprotena y Ki67. El nivel normal de expresin corresponde esencialmente con el nivel de expresin medido en hepatocitos normales, y es menor que el nivel de expresin medido en una lnea celular de hgado humano modificada tumorignica, por ejemplo, HepG2.The transplanted cells did not overproliferate as shown by microscopic observation, indicating the absence of tumorigenic colonies and a normal level of expression of the tumorigenic markers a-fetoprotein and Ki67. The normal level of expression corresponds essentially to the level of expression measured in normal hepatocytes, and is lower than the level of expression measured in a tumorigenic modified human liver cell line, for example, HepG2.

Ejemplo 2Example 2

Un tratamiento ejemplar con las clulas progenitoras o clulas madre originadas en hgado de la invencin, las lneas celulares de los mismos o poblaciones celulares que comprenden los mismos (mencionando especficamente, aunque por supuesto sin limitacin, la lnea LMBP 6452C), o la progenie de los mismos, opcionalmente modificados genticamente, puede ser el siguiente.An exemplary treatment with the progenitor cells or stem cells originating in liver of the invention, the cell lines thereof or cell populations comprising the same (specifically mentioning, but of course without limitation, the LMBP 6452C line), or the progeny of they, optionally genetically modified, can be the following.

Se infunden clulas en inyecciones en serie, preferiblemente no superando las 25 a 50 x 106 clulas/kg, preferiblemente separadas 4 horas, o separadas 8 horas, o ms de 8 horas hasta una semana, o ms de una semana. Se infunden una cantidad total de clulas de 250 x 108 clulas/kg, o 500 x 106 clulas/kg durante unos das, preferiblemente una o preferiblemente dos semanas. Las infusiones en serie pueden repetirse segn sea necesario, cada mes o cada seis meses o cada ao o ms.Cells are infused into serial injections, preferably not exceeding 25 to 50 x 106 cells / kg, preferably 4 hours apart, or 8 hours apart, or more than 8 hours to a week, or more than a week. A total amount of cells of 250 x 108 cells / kg, or 500 x 106 cells / kg are infused for a few days, preferably one or preferably two weeks. Serial infusions can be repeated as necessary, every month or every six months or every year or more.

El acceso a la vena porta es mediante puncin directa con gua radiolgica o ultrasnica, mediante una aguja de puncin o mediante un catter percutneo, o mediante un dispositivo Port-a-cath, o mediante un dispositivo Broviac insertado quirrgicamente en cualquier vaso que drene la vena porta, preferiblemente la vena mesentrica inferior o una vena colnica. El catter puede dejarse durante varias horas, preferiblemente varios das, preferiblemente varias semanas o preferiblemente varios meses hasta dos aos, o preferiblemente ms, para infusiones repetidas siempre que sea necesario.Access to the portal vein is by direct puncture with radiological or ultrasonic guidance, by means of a puncture needle or by a percutaneous catheter, or by a Port-a-cath device, or by a Broviac device surgically inserted into any vessel that drain the portal vein, preferably the inferior mesenteric vein or a colonic vein. The catheter may be left for several hours, preferably several days, preferably several weeks or preferably several months up to two years, or preferably more, for repeated infusions whenever necessary.

La inmunosupresin se inicia el da de infusin, preferiblemente el da antes, preferiblemente con tacrolims (FK506) y esteroides. El nivel sanguneo continuo de tacrolims es preferiblemente de 8 ng/ml inicialmente, de 6 ng/ml despus de tres meses, de 4 ng/ml despus de 6 meses y se mantiene entonces aproximadamente a 4 ng/ml. Los esteroides se administran preferiblemente en forma de prednisona o prednisolona, inicialmente a 5 mg/kg el da 1, 4 mg/kg el da 2, 3 mg/kg el da 3, 2 mg/kg el da 4, 1 mg/kg el da 5, y entonces se reducen progresivamente para alcanzar 0,25 mg/kg a los 3 meses, y se termina a los 6 meses. La inmunosupresin alternativa puede incluir, solos o en combinacin, ciclosporina A, anticuerpos anti-receptor de IL-2, globulinas anti-timocito o cualquier anticuerpo monoclonal o policlonal anti-linfocito humano, micofenolato de mofetilo o azatioprina o cualquier agente antimetablico, ciclosporina, rapamune o cualquier otro inhibidor de calcineurina.Immunosuppression begins on the day of infusion, preferably the day before, preferably with tacrolimus (FK506) and steroids. The continuous blood level of tacrolimus is preferably 8 ng / ml initially, 6 ng / ml after three months, 4 ng / ml after 6 months and is then maintained at approximately 4 ng / ml. Steroids are preferably administered in the form of prednisone or prednisolone, initially at 5 mg / kg on day 1, 4 mg / kg on day 2, 3 mg / kg on day 3, 2 mg / kg on day 4, 1 mg / kg on day 5, and then gradually reduce to reach 0.25 mg / kg at 3 months, and end at 6 months. Alternative immunosuppression may include, alone or in combination, cyclosporin A, anti-IL-2 receptor antibodies, anti-thymocyte globulins or any human anti-lymphocyte monoclonal or polyclonal antibody, mycophenolate mofetil or azathioprine or any antimetabolic agent, cyclosporine, rapamune or any other calcineurin inhibitor.

1010 2.2. 15 3.15 3. 4.Four. 20twenty 2525 3030 5. 355. 35 4040 6. 456. 45 REIVINDICACIONES Clula progenitora o clula madre heptica humana para su uso en el tratamiento de una enfermedad heptica, en la que dicha clula progenitora o clula madre heptica humana es:Progenitor cell or human liver stem cell for use in the treatment of a liver disease, wherein said progenitor cell or human liver stem cell is: (i) una clula progenitora o clula madre humana aislada originada a partir de hgado adulto humano que tiene crecimiento en monocapas, forma aplanada, citoplasma amplio y ncleos ovoides con uno o dos nucleolos y que tiene las siguientes caractersticas: negativa para al menos un marcador de linaje linfohematopoytico seleccionado de CD45, CD34 y CD117; positiva para al menos un marcador mesenquimal seleccionado de CD90, CD29 y CD44; positiva para el marcador de hepatocito albmina (ALB); positiva para vimentina y a-actina de msculo liso (ASMA), o(i) an isolated human progenitor cell or stem cell originating from human adult liver that has growth in monolayers, flattened form, broad cytoplasm and ovoid nuclei with one or two nucleoli and that has the following characteristics: negative for at least one marker of lymphohematopoietic lineage selected from CD45, CD34 and CD117; positive for at least one selected mesenchymal marker of CD90, CD29 and CD44; positive for the albumin hepatocyte marker (ALB); positive for vimentin and smooth muscle a-actin (ASMA), or (ii) tal como se define en (i), y es una lnea celular, o(ii) as defined in (i), and is a cell line, or (iii) tal como se define en (i), y est comprendida en una poblacin celular.(iii) as defined in (i), and is comprised in a cellular population. Clula progenitora o clula madre heptica humana para su uso segn la reivindicacin 1, en la que dicha clula progenitora o clula madre humana aislada es tambin negativa para citoqueratina-19 (CK-19) y CD133.Progenitor cell or human liver stem cell for use according to claim 1, wherein said isolated progenitor cell or human stem cell is also negative for cytokeratin-19 (CK-19) and CD133. Clula progenitora o clula madre heptica humana para su uso segn la reivindicacin 1 o 2, en la que dicha clula progenitora o clula madre humana aislada expresa adems una, ms de una o todas de las siguientes molculas: CD49e, CD13, CD54 y complejo principal de histocompatibilidad (MHC) de clase I (HLA-ABC).Progenitor cell or human liver stem cell for use according to claim 1 or 2, wherein said isolated progenitor cell or human stem cell further expresses one, more than one or all of the following molecules: CD49e, CD13, CD54 and major complex of histocompatibility (MHC) class I (HLA-ABC). Clula progenitora o clula madre heptica humana para su uso segn cualquiera de las reivindicaciones 1 a 3, en la que la enfermedad heptica es fenilcetonuria y otras aminoacidopatas, hemofilia y otras deficiencias de factor de coagulacin, hipercolesterolemia familiar y otros trastornos del metabolismo lipdico, trastornos del ciclo de la urea, glucogenosis, galactosemia, fructosemia, tirosinemia, deficiencias del metabolismo de protenas e hidratos de carbono, aciduria orgnica, enfermedades mitocondriales, trastornos peroxismicos y lisosmicos, anomalas de la sntesis de protenas, defectos de transportadores de clulas hepticas, defecto de glucosilacin, hepatitis, cirrosis, errores congnitos del metabolismo, insuficiencia heptica aguda, infecciones hepticas agudas, toxicidad qumica aguda, insuficiencia heptica crnica, colangitis, cirrosis biliar, sndrome de Alagille, deficiencia de a-1-antitripsina, hepatitis autoinmune, atresia biliar, cncer de hgado, enfermedad qustica del hgado, esteatosis heptica, galactosemia, clculos biliares, sndrome de Gilbert, hemocromatosis, hepatitis A, hepatitis B, hepatitis C y otras infecciones vricas de hepatitis, porfiria, colangitis esclerosante primaria, sndrome de Reye, sarcoidosis, tirosinemia, enfermedad de almacenamiento de glucgeno de tipo 1 o enfermedad de Wilson.Progenitor cell or human liver stem cell for use according to any of
